casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
ARMSTRONG. No. 136P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Daniel S. Bullard, Gibsonville, for Margaret Armstrong.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31 of Dismissal of Petition for Writ of Supersedeas Under Rule 23":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
